verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and tell<WH559> them:<WH376> 'When either man or woman<WH802> shall make<WH6381> a special vow,<WH5087> the vow<WH5087> of a Nazirite,<WH5139> to separate<WH5144> himself to Yahweh,<WH3068>

he shall separate<WH5144> himself from wine<WH3196> and strong drink.<WH7941> He shall drink<WH8354> no vinegar<WH2558> of wine,<WH3196> or vinegar<WH2558> of fermented drink,<WH7941> neither shall he drink<WH8354> any juice<WH4952> of grapes,<WH6025> nor eat<WH398> fresh<WH3892> grapes<WH6025> or dried.<WH3002>
All the days<WH3117> of his separation<WH5145> he shall eat<WH398> nothing that is made<WH6213> of the<WH1612> grapevine,<WH3196> from the seeds<WH2785> even to the skins.<WH2085>

<WH3117>"'All the days of his vow<WH5088> of separation<WH5145> no razor<WH8593> shall come<WH5674> on his head,<WH7218> until the days<WH3117> are fulfilled,<WH4390> in which he separates<WH5144> himself to Yahweh.<WH3068> He shall be holy.<WH6918> He shall let the locks<WH6545> of the hair<WH8181> of his head<WH7218> grow long.<WH1431>
<WH3117>"'All the days that he separates<WH5144> himself to Yahweh<WH3068> he shall not go<WH935> near a dead<WH4191> body.<WH5315>

He shall not make himself unclean<WH2930> for his father,<WH1> or for his mother,<WH517> for his brother,<WH251> or for his sister,<WH269> when they die;<WH4194> because his separation<WH5145> to God<WH430> is on his head.<WH7218>
All the days<WH3117> of his separation<WH5145> he is holy<WH6918> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

<WH4191>"'If any man dies<WH4191> very<WH6621> suddenly<WH6597> beside him,<WH7218> and he defiles the head of his separation;<WH5145> then he shall shave<WH1548> his head<WH7218> in the day<WH3117> of his cleansing.<WH2893> On the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> he shall shave it.<WH1548>

On the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> he shall bring<WH935> two<WH8147> turtledoves<WH8449> or two<WH8147> young<WH1121> pigeons<WH3123> to the priest,<WH3548> to the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

The priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6213> one<WH259> for a sin offering,<WH2403> and the other<WH259> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> and make atonement<WH3722> for him,<WH834> because he sinned<WH2398> by reason of the dead,<WH5315> and shall make his head<WH7218> holy<WH6942> that same day.<WH3117>

He shall separate<WH5144> to Yahweh<WH3068> the days<WH3117> of his separation,<WH5145> and shall bring<WH935> a male lamb<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old for a trespass offering;<WH817> but the former<WH7223> days<WH3117> shall be void,<WH5307> because his separation<WH5145> was defiled.<WH2930>

<WH8451>"'This is the law of the Nazirite:<WH5139> when<WH3117> the days<WH3117> of his separation<WH5145> are fulfilled,<WH4390> he shall be brought<WH935> to the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150>

and he shall offer<WH7126> his offering<WH7133> to Yahweh,<WH3068> one<WH259> male lamb<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish<WH8549> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> and one<WH259> ewe lamb<WH3535> a<WH1323> year<WH8141> old without blemish<WH8549> for a sin offering,<WH2403> and one<WH259> ram<WH352> without blemish<WH8549> for peace offerings,<WH8002>

and a basket<WH5536> of unleavened bread,<WH4682> cakes<WH2471> of fine flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> and unleavened<WH4682> wafers<WH7550> anointed<WH4886> with oil,<WH8081> and their meal offering,<WH4503> and their drink offerings.<WH5262>
The priest<WH3548> shall present<WH7126> them before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> and shall offer<WH7126> his sin offering,<WH2403> and his burnt offering.<WH2403>

He shall offer<WH6213> the ram<WH352> for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002> to Yahweh,<WH3068> with the basket<WH5536> of unleavened bread.<WH4682> The priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6213> also its meal offering,<WH4503> and its drink offering.<WH5262>

The Nazirite<WH5139> shall shave<WH1548> the head<WH7218> of his separation<WH5145> at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> and shall take<WH3947> the hair<WH8181> of the head<WH7218> of his separation,<WH5145> and put<WH5414> it on the fire<WH784> which is under the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings.<WH8002>

The priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> the boiled<WH1311> shoulder<WH2220> of the ram,<WH352> and one<WH259> unleavened<WH4682> cake<WH2471> out of the basket,<WH5536> and one<WH259> unleavened<WH4682> wafer,<WH7550> and shall put<WH5414> them on the hands<WH3709> of the Nazirite,<WH5139> after<WH310> he has shaved<WH1548> the head of his separation;<WH5145>

and the priest<WH3548> shall wave<WH5130> them for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068> This is holy<WH6944> for the priest,<WH3548> together with the breast<WH2373> that is waved<WH8573> and the thigh<WH7785> that is offered.<WH8641> After<WH310> that the Nazirite<WH5139> may drink<WH8354> wine.<WH3196>

<WH8451>"'This is the law of the Nazirite<WH5139> who vows,<WH5087> and of his offering<WH7133> to Yahweh<WH3068> for his separation,<WH5145> besides that which he is able<WH3027> to get.<WH5381> According<WH6310> to his vow<WH5088> which he vows,<WH5088> so he must do<WH6213> after the law<WH8451> of his separation.<WH5145>'"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Speak<WH1696> to Aaron<WH175> and to his sons,<WH1121> saying,<WH559> <WH3541> 'This is how you shall bless<WH1288> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>' You shall tell them,<WH559>
<WH3068> 'Yahweh bless<WH1288> you,<WH8104> and keep you.
Yahweh<WH3068> make his face<WH6440> to shine<WH215> on you,<WH2603> and be gracious to you.
Yahweh<WH3068> lift up<WH5375> his face<WH6440> toward you,<WH7760> and give you peace.<WH7965>'
"So they shall put<WH7760> my name<WH8034> on the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and I will bless them.<WH1288>"
